products.models module¶

class products.models.Product(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: django.db.models.base.Model

This class contains the essential fields and behaviors of the data you’re storing. Each model maps to a single database table.

This class is used to create a database table containg those attributes.

Bases: django.core.exceptions.ObjectDoesNotExist

category¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

description¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

image¶

Just like the FileDescriptor, but for ImageFields. The only difference is assigning the width/height to the width_field/height_field, if appropriate.

products.urls module¶

products.views module¶

products.views.add_product(request)[source]¶

This method will use to add new products in the shop. It will take the product name, category, price, photo, description and will store them in database. Only admin can access this function, if the user is not admin it will show an error message. Otherwise, it will store the data into the database and return the url of home page.

Parameters

  • name – request - used to generate responses(Http) depending on the request that it receives

  • type – HttpResponse

Returns

returns home page

products.views.delete_product(request, product_id)[source]¶

This method will use to delete products in the shop. It will find the specific product with product id which is the primary key of the product, and delete that specific product. Only admin can access this function, if the user is not admin it will show an error message. Otherwise, it will delete the data from the database and return the url of home page.

Parameters

  • name – request - used to generate responses(Http) depending on the request that it receives

  • type – HttpResponse

  • name – product_id - used to find the specific product for update

  • type – HttpResponse

Returns

returns home page

products.views.fish(request)[source]¶

This method will get products where category is Fish. After that it will return the url of fish html page.

Parameters

  • name – request - used to generate responses(Http) depending on the request that it receives

  • type – HttpResponse

Returns

returns fish page

products.views.update_product(request, product_id)[source]¶

This method will use to update or edit products in the shop. It will find the specific product with product id which is the primary key of the product. Only admin can access this function, if the user is not admin it will show an error message. Otherwise, it will update the data into the database and return the url of home page.

Parameters

  • name – request - used to generate responses(Http) depending on the request that it receives

  • type – HttpResponse

  • name – product_id - used to find the specific product for update

  • type – HttpResponse

Returns

returns home page

products.views.vegetable(request)[source]¶

This method will get products where category is Vegetable. After that it will return the url of vegetable html page.

Parameters

  • name – request - used to generate responses(Http) depending on the request that it receives

  • type – HttpResponse

Returns

returns vegetable page
